name: Epic Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
Lunge into extreme tic-tac-toe action with sound and color! Play with your PC or your friends and have fun :)

Features:
  • 1 and 2 player mode.
  • Really colorful and sound-effect-ful!
  • Soundtrack consisting of 2 songs because yes.
Warning:

 Flashing colors
